pet_information.name: Sphinx
pet_information.description: Sphinx is a friendly and affectionate dog with a distinctive brindle coat. He is gentle and loves to play fetch in the park. Sphinx gets along well with children and other pets.

pet_information.name: Luna
pet_information.description: Luna is an elegant and vocal Siamese cat. She enjoys engaging in conversations with her owners and loves to be the center of attention. Luna is also very affectionate and enjoys cuddling.

pet_information.name: Loyola
pet_information.description: Loyola is the perfect example of how pigeons inspire us every day with their bravery and resilience! Little Loyola was just a baby when she was found with one of her legs so badly injured that she needed emergency amputation surgery to save her life.
